mapper.sql: UDF_OTL_DTC_ID, CRE_COMP_ID, SRC_ANA_DASE_ID, LRN_MDL_ID, SV_RES_TYP_CD, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_USER_ID, WRIT_DTM
mapper.insert: insert into WAD_UODC_SV_RES (UDF_OTL_DTC_ID, CRE_COMP_ID, SRC_ANA_DASE_ID, LRN_MDL_ID, SV_RES_TYP_CD, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_USER_ID, WRIT_DTM) values (#{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcAnaDaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lrnMdlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svResTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

UDF_OTL_DTC_ID,

mapper.update:
update WAD_UODC_SV_RES
SRC_ANA_DASE_ID = #{srcAnaDaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LRN_MDL_ID = #{lrnMdlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SV_RES_TYP_CD = #{svResTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WRIT_USER_ID = #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WRIT_DTM = #{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WAD_UODC_SV_RES set SRC_ANA_DASE_ID = #{srcAnaDaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LRN_MDL_ID = #{lrnMdlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SV_RES_TYP_CD = #{svResTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WRIT_USER_ID = #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WRIT_DTM = #{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , A.CRE_COMP_ID , A.SV_RES_TYP_CD , A.SRC_ANA_DASE_ID , B.ANA_DASE_NM FROM WAD_UODC_SV_RES A LEFT JOIN WAD_UODC_ANA_DASE B ON B.ANA_DASE_ID = A.SRC_ANA_DASE_ID WHERE A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
